nodes.text: The Myriad Visual System – MK. 2 was a viewing software that was included in the 3PO-series protocol droid. Its "human" mode gave the protocol droid a standard visual reference, and the "infra-red" mode let it see in the dark. Additional modes, such as the "neon" mode, allowed the droid to scan for specific properties such as heat, motion, or gas composition.
